divs: Sighting DetailsI came outside to smoke a cigarette and immediately spotted elongated ovals that were of a warm color and feel. They were far apart and very close over buildings and seemed extremely large. As I walked they followed while ascending. There was absolute silence. The continued to ascend to a great hight and began to get smaller (probably due to elevation.) They moved closer together in a very uniform fashion. At this point they very very close, but exercised great control. Then the one on the right just disappeared shortly after the other disappeared over the ocdean
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Redondo Beach
There was one other sighting in Redondo Beach on or around August 16th 2011
